snippet: Gov. Bobby Jindal’s plan to close a deficit received support from state lawmakers, who backed a stopgap approach that leaves problems for the next governor.
abstract: Louisiana legislators vote overwhelmingly in support of Gov Bobby Jindal's stopgap plan to close $487 million deficit; plan leaves significant problems in place for next governor.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Bobby Jindal’s plan to close a deficit received support from state lawmakers, who backed a stopgap approach that leaves problems for the next governor.

headline.main: Louisiana: Budget Leaves Troubles for New Governor
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: Budget Leaves Troubles for New Governor
